name: SleepsTillSanta
0:
”Alexa, open Sleeps Till Santa”
”Alexa, ask Sleeps Till Santa to sing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleeps till santa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Forget counting down the days, SING the sleeps ‘til Christmas with ‘Sleeps Till Santa.’
Like a musical advent calendar, this catchy song updates daily to tell you how many sleeps are left until Christmas Eve. You might even hear a cameo from Santa as the big day draws near!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
